summary: After having been lost at sea for several years, a missing wife thought long dead returns just after her husband has remarried.
cast: Doris Day|James Garner|Polly Bergen|Thelma Ritter|Fred Clark|Don Knotts|Elliott Reid|Edgar Buchanan|John Astin|Pat Harrington Jr.|Eddie Quillan|Max Showalter|Alvy Moore|Pami Lee|Leslie Farrell|Chuck Connors|Jimmy Baya|Steve Carruthers|Harry Carter|Joel Collins|Christopher Connelly|Bing Davidson|Med Flory|Bess Flowers|Kelton Garwood|Mary George|James Gonzalez|Harold Goodwin|Sid Gould|John Harmon|Ted Jacques|Robert Locke Lorraine|Edward McNally|Joseph Mell|Emile Meyer|Pat Moran|Karen Norris|Jack Orrison|James Patridge|Paul Power|Leoda Richards|Stan Richards|Edward Rickard|Sheila Rogers|Michael Romanoff|Rachel Romen|Jack Sahakian|Cosmo Sardo|Bernard Sell|Leslie Sketchley|Norman Stevans|Alan Sues|Brad Trumbull|Rosa Turich
title: Apártate, cariño
